doc: The pathname to a SDF file containing the chemical system for which the atom types should be generated.

The pathname to a file defining the atom types. This is a text file where each line respects the following syntax: <int> <String> <String> where the integer is the atom type, the first string is currently not used, and the last string is a SMARTS query used to identify the atoms belonging to the type.
The pathname to the file where to print the assigned atom types.
The format for writing basis set. Possible values are 'TXYZ' for Tinker-XYZ format, or 'List'.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
